<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2022/03/29/07-49-%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%B7%D0%B0-dirty-side-%D0%B2%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%B5-%D0%B2%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B3-%D1%85%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BC-%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B5%D1%81-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/kirilneykov.jpg" alt="Кирил Нейков за "Dirty Side": Времето не е враг, харесвам този процес на деструктивно обновление">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2022/03/29/07-49-%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B9%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%B7%D0%B0-dirty-side-%D0%B2%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%B5-%D0%B2%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B3-%D1%85%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BC-%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%86%D0%B5%D1%81-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D0%B1%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5.html">Кирил Нейков за "Dirty Side": Времето не е враг, харесвам този процес на деструктивно обновление</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Лъскавото, идиличното не е добър материал за писане - <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2022/02/21/11-18-%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8A%D1%80-%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D0%B2%D1%8A%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%8A%D1%82-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D1%8A%D0%BB%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B5-%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/dimganev.jpg" alt="Димитър Ганев: Въпросът за природата на поета дълбоко не ме интересува">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2022/02/21/11-18-%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8A%D1%80-%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D0%B2%D1%8A%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%8A%D1%82-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D1%8A%D0%BB%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B5-%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0.html">Димитър Ганев: Въпросът за природата на поета дълбоко не ме интересува</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Преди отдавах голямо значение на краищата, на това как едно стихотворение завършва. <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2021/12/20/08-56-%D0%B9%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B8-%D0%B8-%D1%87%D1%83%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9%D1%82%D0%BE-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/joannaelmy.jpg" alt="Йоанна Елми: Да се мисли и чувства е занаят, който трябва да се практикува ежедневно">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2021/12/20/08-56-%D0%B9%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B8-%D0%B8-%D1%87%D1%83%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9%D1%82%D0%BE-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">Йоанна Елми: Да се мисли и чувства е занаят, който трябва да се практикува ежедневно</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Разбирането за това какво е насилие и какво не, е различно у нас.
